title: Frequently Ask Questions?
subtitle: Find answers to common questions about my design process, services etc…

items.question: What services do you provide?
items.answer: Holistic wealth management, multi-generational planning, bespoke portfolios, offshore structuring, non-financial asset management, and lifestyle advisory.

items.question: How do you onboard new clients?
items.answer: We begin with a confidential discovery session, followed by a tailored proposal and phased onboarding plan to align on objectives, timelines and reporting.

items.question: What are your fees?
items.answer: Fees depend on service scope and assets under management. We offer transparent fee schedules and bespoke proposals — please contact us for a quote.

items.question: Do you offer international structuring?
items.answer: Yes — we advise on cross-border solutions, tax-efficient ownership structures, and compliant international wealth planning with trusted partners.

items.question: How do you protect client privacy?
items.answer: Client confidentiality is paramount. We use encrypted communication, strict access controls, and limited-disclosure engagements to protect client information.

items.question: Can I change my service package later?
items.answer: Absolutely — our services are modular and can be adjusted as your needs evolve. We review plans regularly to ensure alignment with your goals.
